title: Why am I not getting text notifications from top 3 contacts of mine suddenly?
content: I have 3 contacts that I text often that suddenly have this notice: At your request, android is blocking this category of notifications from appearing on this device. I do not get notified at all when these contacts text me. I do not know how this got "turned on" and I don't know how to fix it and no one at Google is helping. Please does anyone know how to fix this??
